review: I wanted this device to mirror my laptop to my tv. it works, but it works like tv worked in 1950. the video is herky jerky and the sound doesn't match the action on the screen. I'll probably send it back.

review: Love this device, it is a little slow to start netflix and youtube videos but it isn't unreasonably slow.Can cast my chrome tab through which I can watch amazon prime videos. When casting chrome tabs with my old laptop , the video and audio lags, but no issues when I do it from my new laptop.
